message: Via you are the 1st Marine that has written something so foolish because """"if"""" you are SSGT in my beloved Corps, you seriously need to drop out as a recruiter and go do another MOS because you are totally unqualified for your post. And how do you think I know this because I served and was nominated as one of the Top Marine Recruiters during my time in the Corps from 1995-2001!!! Get some....Oohhh Rahhh As I said before, you need to check your position Marine!
